examples.text: Coordinate term: (informal, to one person) hoş geldin

etymology:
Cognate with Kazakh қош келдіңіз (qoş keldıñız), Azerbaijani xoş gəldiniz (“you came well”), Kyrgyz кош келипсиз (koş kelipsiz), Uzbek xush kelibsiz (“you have come well”).
Possibly a partial calque of Classical Persian خْوَشْ آمَدید (xwaš āmadēd, “welcome”), compare with Iranian Persian خوش آمَدید (xoš âmadid).
